creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: man's tzute with tassels at each corner; upper and lower 1/4 red fabric with black stripe; center section multicolored design with zig zag and diamond motifs; 2 panels joined at center with multicolored horizontal stripe; tassels have 3 fiber covered circles with a knot between 2nd and 3rd long fringe below
title: Man's tzute
